title: Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch, Black Dial Style: 98B406
descriptions:
Bulova Men’s Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch (Style 98B406)

Easy to read. Easy to wear. Built to last.

What you’ll notice at a glance:
- Clear black dial with bright gold and silver details, so the time is easy to see.
- Glowing hands and hour markers help you read the time in low light.
- Strong domed crystal that resists everyday scratches.

Comfort and safety:
- Smooth, curved metal links feel comfortable on the wrist.
- Secure sport foldover clasp to keep the watch safely on.
- Stainless steel with a gold-tone finish for a classic, dressy look.

Helpful features you can use or ignore:
- Calendar window shows the date.
- 24-hour display if you like a day/night reference.
- Chronograph (stopwatch) for simple timing—press a button to start, stop, and reset.

Made for real life:
- Water resistant to 100 meters. Safe for handwashing, rain, and swimming at the pool. Not for diving.
- Sturdy black timing bezel with gold accents for a stylish look and quick timing checks.

Why this watch is a good choice:
- Large, high-contrast face for easy reading.
- Reliable Bulova quality from the Marine Star collection.
- Stylish enough for special occasions, durable enough for everyday wear.

In short: a handsome gold-tone Bulova that’s easy to read, comfortable to wear, and dependable day after day.
